title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
desc: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
org: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

records.QueryText: Farmer wants to know about Aeroponics?
records.KccAns: Aeroponics is the process of growing plants in an air or mist environment without the use of soil or an aggregate medium.
